argument.description: The value used to determine the largest integer value that is equal to or less than a number.

returnType: The FLOOR function returns an integer value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL FLOOR function returns the largest integer value that is equal to or less than a number.
sample:
FLOOR(5.9)
Result: 5

FLOOR(34.29)
Result: 34

FLOOR(-5.9)
Result: -6
